comments: Randle (NYK) avoids placing his underneath the ball prior to resuming his dribble.
Adebayo (MIA) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he moves to imminently guard an opponent.
Brunson (NYK) moves alongside Lowry's (MIA) path and marginal body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Hart (NYK) and Lowry (MIA) mutually come together at the same spot and marginal contact occurs during the pursuit of the rebound.
Lowry (MIA) falls to the floor and incidental contact occurs with Hart's (NYK) foot after the release of his shot attempt near the rim attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) extends his arm to contest and initiates contact with Randle's (NYK)  arm that affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Randle (NYK) and Martin (MIA) come together in pursuit of the loose ball and marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Adebayo (MIA) swipes down and initiates contact with Robinson's (NYK) arm that affects his SQBR.
Adebayo (MIA) briefly clasps and releases Brunson's (NYK) arm and marginal contact occurs as he attempts to close out on the jump shot attempt.
Lowry (MIA) reaches in and initiates contact with Hart's (NYK) arm that affects his SQBR.
Robinson (NYK) is moving alongside Vincent's (MIA) path and maintains a legal guarding position as he slips and marginal body contact occurs as the two come together during the drive.
Randle (NYK) steps over the baseline prior to releasing the ball during the inbound.
Adebayo (MIA) slightly leans to his left as he establishes himself in a screening position Brunson's (NYK) path and does not deliver illegal contact as the screen is set.
Strus (MIA) reaches in and avoids making arm contact with Randle (NYK) as he makes the intended pass.
Adebayo (MIA) brings his arm forward and marginal contact occurs with Brunson's (NYK) arm during the rip-through at the start of the drive.
Strus (MIA) extends both hands forward and initiates contact with Hart (NYK) that dislodges him from his offensive position.
Lowry (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball and cleanly dislodges it away from Randle (NYK) prior to incidental arm contact occurring.
Strus (MIA) reaches in and initiates contact with Hart's (NYK) arm that affects his SQBR.
